title: 4 Win IP Boost Disappeared
body:
Hi, I tried to verify my email address for my 4 win IP Boost but I never received the boost. You may look at my account if you would like, they said that they would send a verification email to my address but I never received such email. Could you please assist me?

Thanks!

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it doesn't look like you are email verified yet. Give it another go and let me know if it works this time.
